2.
```{r}
exp_sum = function(n) {
  r = 1.08
  x = seq(1, n, 1)
  result = sum(r^x)
  return(result)
  }

exp_quick = function(n) {
  r = 1.08
  result = ((r^(n+1)-1)/(r-1)) - 1
  return(result)
}

exp_sum(10)
exp_sum(20)
exp_sum(30)
exp_sum(40)

exp_quick(10)
exp_quick(20)
exp_quick(30)
exp_quick(40)

exp_quick_vec = exp_quick(c(1:100))
```

lin_sum = function(n) {
  x = seq(1, n, 1)
  result = sum(x)
  return(result)
  }

lin_quick = function(n) {
  result = (n*(n+1))/2
  return(result)
}

```{r}
sq_sum = function(n) {
  x = seq(1, n, 1)
  result = sum(x^2)
  return(result)
  }

sq_quick = function(n) {
  result = (n*(n+1)*(2*n+1))/6
  return(result)
}

sq_sum(100)
sq_sum(200)
sq_sum(400)
sq_sum(800)

sq_quick(100)
sq_quick(200)
sq_quick(400)
sq_quick(800)

sq_quick_vec = sq_quick(c(1:100))
```

5.
```{r}
log_sum = function(n) {
  x = seq(1, n, 1)
  result = sum(1/x)
  return(result)
  }

log_quick = function(n) {
  result = log(n)
  return(result)
}

log_sum(100)
log_sum(200)
log_sum(400)
log_sum(800)

log_quick(100)
log_quick(200)
log_quick(400)
log_quick(800)

log_quick_vec = log_quick(c(1:100))
```

The limit of s_n - log(n) is Euler's constant (gamma), approx equal to 0.5772.

```{r}
string_length = function(s1, s2) {
  s1_len = nchar(s1)
  s2_len = nchar(s2)
  
  if (s1_len == s2_len){
    return("The strings have the same length")
  }
    else if (s1_len > s2_len){
      return(paste(s1, " is longer")) 
      }
  
    else if (s1_len < s2_len){
      return(paste(s2, " is longer"))
    }
  else {
    return("Error")
  }
}
```
